constraints.constraint: ToolCard uses iconMap to resolve string icon names to Lucide components (server/client boundary pattern)

Use Card component with hoverable prop for hover effects
Grid uses responsive classes: grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3
Component tests use Vitest + Testing Library with happy-dom environment
